page.title: 13THELBRIDGE
page.content: Thelbridge is a widespread rural community.The B3042 road runs through it from Witheridge to Eggesford.There are 173 people on the electoral roll living mainly on farms or in cottages. There are 2 council houses.There is a pub run by Mr.and Mrs.Davis.People come to it from Worlington and Drayford.Opposite the pub is an agricultural merchants run by Mr. Smith who sells animal feed.It is open between 8 a.m.and 5 p.m. Mr. Smith is also a blacksmith and is building a house.Mr.and Mrs.Vigurs live in a caravan nearby and they are building a bungalow.Mr.Hudson is the rector of Thelbridge Church.This is one of his 6 churches.E.and W.Worlington are two others.Nothlake Chapel is a Methodist Chapel.The minister is Rev. Keith Marsden.There are 2 services on Sunday afternoon.
